name: Barrel-Man
description:
Barrel-Man - 3D low-poly platform game consisting of 20 levels with a final boss. For completing levels, you can get hats for the character.

Barrel Man Features:

- There is a man in a barrel

- There is a flying barrel

- There is a barrel tank

- Works offline

To get to the next level you need to go through the portal.

Each level will be rated from 1 to 3 stars, for a certain number of stars you can open new caps.

Control:

wasd - move

mouse movements - camera rotation (there are sensitivity settings)

space - jump

LMB - attack
